meanings.definition: The central part of a city, typically containing the main business and commercial areas.
meanings.sent1: In midtown, you can find many tall buildings and busy streets.
meanings.sent2: People often go to midtown for work and shopping.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that in midtown, even the pigeons wear suits!
meanings.sent4: The heart of the city beats strongest in midtown.
meanings.sent5: The lights of midtown shine like a thousand stars at night.

meanings.definition: The middle section of a town or city.
meanings.sent1: Our house is located in midtown, close to the park.
meanings.sent2: The library is in midtown, making it convenient for everyone.
meanings.sent3: I always get lost in midtown, it's like a maze of streets!
meanings.sent4: Midtown is like the calm eye of a bustling city storm.
meanings.sent5: The heart of the town beats loudest in midtown.
